{"database_schema": ""Description for table: Borrow"

  nonce: BigInt!

  logIndex: Int!

  "Description for column: gasUsed"
  gasUsed: BigInt
  "Description for column: gasLimit"
  gasLimit: BigInt
  "Description for column: blockNumber"
  blockNumber: BigInt!
  "Description for column: timestamp"
  timestamp: BigInt!
  "Description for column: account"
  account: Account!
  "Description for column: accountActor"
  accountActor: Account
  "Description for column: market"
  market: Market!
  "Description for column: position"
  position: Position!
  "Description for column: asset"
  asset: Token!

  "Description for column: amountUSD"

}"}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"documented_schema": ""Description for table: Borrow"
type Borrow implements Event @entity(immutable: true) @transaction {
  "Unique identifier for the borrow event"
  id: Bytes!
  "Hash of the transaction associated with the borrow event"
  hash: Bytes!
  "Nonce of the transaction"
  nonce: BigInt!
  "Index of the log entry in the block"
  logIndex: Int!
  "Price of gas at the time of the transaction"
  gasPrice: BigInt
  "Amount of gas used by the transaction"
  gasUsed: BigInt
  "Maximum amount of gas allowed for the transaction"
  gasLimit: BigInt
  "Block number in which the transaction was included"
  blockNumber: BigInt!
  "Timestamp of when the transaction was mined"
  timestamp: BigInt!
  "Account involved in the borrow event"
  account: Account!
  "Actor associated with the account, if any"
  accountActor: Account
  "Market in which the borrow event occurred"
  market: Market!
  "Position related to the borrow event"
  position: Position!
  "Token asset involved in the borrow event"
  asset: Token!
  "Amount of the asset borrowed"
  amount: BigInt!
  "Value of the borrowed amount in USD"
  amountUSD: BigDecimal!
}"}
